Identity.History: The Iberians were known to produce the finest iron and steel implements and weapons of the age. The Greek kopis sword is thought to have been a variation of the famous falcata Iberian sword, used for chopping and dismembering opponents. The famous Roman gladius hispaniensis was an invention if the Iberians, adopted by the Romans during the Romano-Iberian Wars.
